bio: I'm a cybersecurity enthusiast specialized in web application penetration testing and self-taught developer.

headline.title: Hello, friend! I'm sim0wn, an ethical hacker.
headline.subTitle: I'm a cybersecurity enthusiast specialized in offensive security. I started as a programmer, having my first contact with the Java language at the age of 11. Over time, I came across the information security area, in which I have been self-taught since 2018, and I follow a routine of constant study and practice.

quote.message: Be curious. Read widely. Try new things. What people call intelligence just boils down to curiosity.
quote.author: Aaron Swartz

metadata.description: Hello, friend. I'm sim0wn, a developer and ethical hacker specialized in web application vulnerability assessment.
